text: It shall be the duty of the Mayor to include in the annual estimates of the District of Columbia estimates of the expenses of the Water Department.

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Items included in annual estimates--Expenses of Water Department.
